item.title: I'm having problems adding global objects
item.dc:creator: @bl00d_filthy bl00d filthy
item.description:
@bl00d_filthy wrote:

Well, i try to add global objects on my server and they wont appear. I compile and everything compiles fine… i run it, go on and whatever object i put isn’t there… here’s my code i have in there.

public void addObj(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects() {

Read full topic
